name: It's MY Turn!
description:
It's MY Turn is a strategic turn-based game in which two brothers compete against each other using toys found around the house.

Two brothers stage a battle between two parties using their more or less new toys. The ultimate goal of both players will be to defeat the opponent, that is, the brother. The challenge will be fought by the toys that each brother chooses in his army, and one turn after another to win victory.

MAIN FEATURE

Make good use of the peculiarities of the chosen toys, creating a strategy that will lead you to victory.

DEVELOPED BY:

SALTY BEE

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 2, 2021/2022)

  • Pietro Sbordone
  • Simone Battaglia

  • Josef Soued
  • Roberto Savino
  • Andrea Barbani
  • Federico Uccelli

  • Riccardo Zaccà
  • Samuele Giuliani

  • Silvia Barbi
  • Linda Panighel
  • AnnaChiara Felletti
